channel.title: Interview on Praveen Lobo
channel.description: Recent content in Interview on Praveen Lobo

item.title: H1B Interview Questions
item.description: I had an H1B interview more than an year ago and written two blog posts about my travel to and from Bangalore and stay in Chennai (here and here). Surprisingly, even today “h1b” is one of the keywords getting highest number of visitors to my site (per Google Analytics). Most of them looking for interview questions. Recently I found a list I had prepared of probable questions the interviewer may ask.
